structure.unit: Return And Registry Of Births, Marriages And Deaths

law.catch_line: Agreements To Verify Existence Of Birth, Marriage Or Death Records
law.text: The state registrar may enter into agreements with state and federal agencies administering public health and welfare programs, registrars of motor vehicles, passport agencies or the National Association for Public Health Statistics and Information Systems to verify the existence of a Massachusetts birth, marriage or death record as an alternative to issuance of a certified copy of the record either to streamline administration of programs and services or to minimize the potential for identity theft and fraud associated with birth and marriage records, driversâ€™ licenses, state identification cards and passports.
